<MethodEndpoint
  method={'post'}
  path={'/api/v1/projects/{username}/{slug}/cover'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Upload a cover image for a project

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[

      schema: { type: 'string' },

      name: 'username',
      required: true,
    },
    { schema: { type: 'string' }, in: 'path', name: 'slug', required: true },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

  responses={{

            required: ['message'],
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '400': {
      description: 'Invalid file or no file uploaded',

          schema: {
            type: 'object',

            },
            required: ['message'],
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {

            required: ['message'],
          },

      },

      description: 'Access denied',

            required: ['message'],

      },
